description.narrative:
LLC Euro Leasing was established in 2004 by a large local car dealer/ manufacturer Atoll Holding. Today Euro Leasing provides a full range of transport leasing services, including additional products which provide entire cycle of fleet management, including vehicles registration, insurance, daily fuel monitoring, damage control, fleet management, GPRS location, etc. Euro Leasing operates five regional representative offices in major Ukrainian cities, works with 150 car service stations throughout Ukraine.
The Companys market share approximates 13%, and it is one of the two serviced leasing providers in Ukraine. The Company leases passenger cars, commercial vehicles (trucks), buses and specialized transport (loaders, tractors and combines) of leading international brands. The client base of the Company includes international clients, as well as large local companies and SMEs. Today, SMEs account for approximately 72% of Companys clients by quantity and for 47% by total fleet.
The proposed transaction fits well into IFCs financial markets strategy in Ukraine. Euro Leasing is one of the leading leasing companies in the country dedicated to both, corporate and SME sectors. It also has substantial exposure to agricultural industry. With this Project, IFC is looking to provide an access to finance for local SMEs, including those engaged in the agricultural sector.
